Output Modules.​PIT_FILE.​PIT_FILE_PKG Body

Implements MODULE.PIT_FILE output module methods

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Published under MIT licence

Constants and global variables
Parameter constants
C_PARAM_GROUP

Parameter group of PIT

C_PIT_FILE

Prefix for parameter names

C_FIRE_THRESHOLD

Parameter name for the fire threshold

C_OUT_DIRECTORY

Parameter name for the directory object to write to

C_FILE_NAME

Parameter name for the file name of the trace file

C_ENTER_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the ENTER-Template

C_LEAVE_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the LEAVE-Template

C_MESSAGE_TEMPLATE

Parameter name for the MESSAGE_TYPE-Template

C_LEVEL_INDICATOR

Parameter name for the level indicator

initialize
procedure initialize

Initialization method.

Is called by INITIALIZE_MODULE and reads several parameters into global variables

Helper Methods
open_file
procedure open_file(
p_write_mode in char
)

Helper method to open the log file. Is called to prepare the log file for writing.

Parameter
p_write_mode
in char

Flag according to UTL_FILE to control how a file has to be opened

close_file
procedure close_file

Helper to close the log file. Is called to close the log file and release the resources.

write_call_stack
procedure write_call_stack(
p_call_stack in pit_call_stack_type,
p_template in varchar2
)

Helper to format call stack entries to write them to the log file.

Templates are defined as parameters and referenced here to control the formatting of the call stack.  After formatting, procedure <WRITE_TO_FILE> is called to append the call stack to the log file.

Parameters
p_call_stack
in pit_call_stack_type

Instance of PIT_CALL_STACK to be printed

p_template
in varchar2

Name of the template to be used to format the output.

log
procedure log(
p_message in message_type
)

see pit_file_pkg.log

log
procedure log(
p_params in msg_params
)

see pit_file_pkg.log

purge
procedure purge

see pit_file_pkg.purge

enter
procedure enter(
p_call_stack in pit_call_stack_type
)

see pit_file_pkg.enter

leave
procedure leave(
p_call_stack in pit_call_stack_type
)

see pit_file_pkg.leave

procedure initialize_module(
self in out pit_file
)
